comment: She is so nice and caring about your progress. She is never rude when correcting you in front of the class. Participation really does matter- so try not to be late. She teaches based off the text book, but her lectures are so amazing, I never used mine to learn-just for partner work.

Good professor! Just wasn't into Japanese anymore and fell on my studying habits unfortunately. Has clear outline on due dates and expectations. Go to class and actually do the work needed for any foreign language class.

Great teacher and just a awesome class. As long as you show up, put in the work and actually study, then you'll do fine. There's homework and a quiz every week, 3 tests, an oral exam, and a final exam, quite a lot but it isn't to bad.
I love her so much, you should take her class
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: Is a good Japanese professor overall, but she tends to interrupt you if you make a mistake and doesn't let you try to correct yourself. Sometimes she said some rude things that she probably didn't think anything of. The material she provided in the class was very clear and useful.
rating_tags: Participation matters--Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback

comment: She is a great professor, you can tell that she wants us to succeed and learn from the class.

It is definitely a hard class but she does a good job of teaching and is always available if you need help outside of class. There are a lot of quizzes so you will have to stay on top of the material or you will fall behind quickly.

Davis Sensei is an amazing teacher. She put a lot of effort into her lectures and is very caring when it comes to her students. She is very easy to contact outside of class and she always responds very quickly. When it comes to the class, there are a lot of quizzes(almost every day) but that is normal for Japanese classes. I would 100% recommend!!!
Davis sensei is great at what she does. She is by far the best professor I've ever had in my life. I am very thankful to have been in her class.

Davis-sensei was a great teacher. There was a lot of speaking with partners in class to get better at speaking, as well as many ask-the-class style questions. If you participate and do the homework, read her feedback, and try to improve, this class is an easy A.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: Akiko sensei is great! She teaches the class well and is SUPER understanding of things and always emailed back really fast. Take her!
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Lots of homework--Accessible outside class

comment: One of the best professors I've ever had. She is so caring and accommodating and makes the class so easy. The only reason I didn't get an A was that I got lazy and chose not to attend class a bunch of times and there's a 10% participation grade for just showing up and participating in class.

Amazing professor, super nice and accommodating. If you show up and work hard she will be willing to accept some late work, but try to do it all on time. It's not a very hard class and she's always available for help before, during, or after class
Davis-sensei is very kind, and she has been my favorite Japanese professor so far. A lot of group work and participation, but that's to be expected in any language class. Love her!
rating_tags: Participation matters--Skip class? You won't pass.--Group projects

comment: This is my second semester taking Davis-sensee's class. She is a literal angel who comes to class every day with a smile on her face, and it's clear to see she's passionate about teaching. Her Powerpoints are very informative with lots of funny short videos. She does her upmost to ensure every student understands the material. Highly recommend!
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures--Caring

comment: Davis-sensei really wants all her students to learn and succeed in the class. She explains everything one needs to do to get an A during the first lecture. Participation matters as it is a foreign language. There is homework often, but it's not a lot each time. I would definitely take her again. She was really sweet and caring. An incredible prof.
rating_tags: Gives good feedback--Skip class? You won't pass.--Amazing lectures

comment: Davis Sensei is an incredible teacher and really wants to see her students succeed.  She tries her best to make sure each student fully understands the content before moving on to the next topic.  She makes classes fun with her creative PowerPoints and activities.  Just show clear effort on HW and participate in class and you'll pass very easily.

Davis Sensei is such a sweet teacher, she really likes to smile a lot and make the class enjoyable. She listens to the students concerns but focuses in on a few select students to keep the class going. Make sure to do as many assignments as you can, study and participate in class. She will provide extra help if you need it. Get ready to laugh lots!
